attributes.action: Remove the title “Right Honourable” from MPs that tell lies to the public.
attributes.additional_details: To strike the title from any politician proven to be a liar in public life.
attributes.background: To help protect the public from lying politicians.

rejection.details:
Appointments to the Privy Council, which determines whether a person is referred to as "Right Honourable", are made by the Sovereign and are for life, so this is not something the Government or House of Commons are responsible for. You can find out more about the Privy Council here: https://privycouncil.independent.gov.uk/

We have published the following related petition, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317470
